poc.name: POC Program

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Full platform access for growing businesses

faq.q1: How does the POC program work?
faq.a1: Our 30-day POC lets you evaluate the platform with your real data. We provide dedicated onboarding support to ensure you can fully test our fraud detection capabilities.
faq.a2: After the POC, you can choose the plan that best fits your transaction volume and feature requirements. We'll help migrate your configuration seamlessly.
faq.q3: Can I customize the AI agents?
faq.a3: Yes, on Professional and Enterprise plans, you can configure custom rules and thresholds. Enterprise customers can also request custom model training.
faq.a4: Our SLA covers uptime guarantees, response time commitments, and support availability. Enterprise SLAs include dedicated support channels and faster response times.

agentsPage.title: Meet Our
agentsPage.subtitle: Specialized AI agents working 24/7 to detect and prevent fraud across all vectors
agentsPage.meetSubtitle: Each agent specializes in a specific domain, working together for comprehensive protection

location.title: Location Agent
location.subtitle: Geographic Anomaly Detection
location.description: Analyzes geographic patterns in real-time to detect impossible travel, location spoofing, and geographic anomalies that indicate fraudulent activity.

network.title: Network Agent
network.subtitle: Connection Pattern Analysis
network.description: Monitors network behavior to identify suspicious connections, bot activity, and coordinated attack patterns across your infrastructure.

auth.title: Authentication Agent
auth.subtitle: Identity Verification
auth.description: Verifies user identity through advanced biometric analysis and authentication patterns to prevent account takeover and identity fraud.

behavioral.title: Behavioral Agent
behavioral.subtitle: User Pattern Analysis
behavioral.description: Analyzes user behavior patterns including typing, navigation, and interaction to detect anomalies indicating compromised accounts.

device.title: Device Agent
device.subtitle: Device Intelligence
device.description: Monitors device fingerprints and characteristics to identify compromised, emulated, or suspicious devices attempting fraudulent transactions.

velocity.title: Velocity Agent
velocity.subtitle: Transaction Speed Analysis
velocity.description: Tracks transaction velocity and patterns to identify rapid-fire fraud attempts, account enumeration, and automated abuse.

agentsPage.collaborationDescription: All 6 agents work together in real-time, sharing insights and combining their specialized knowledge to provide comprehensive fraud protection that no single system could achieve alone.

useCasesPage.title: Industry
useCasesPage.subtitle: Tailored fraud prevention for your specific industry challenges

financial.title: Financial Services Fraud Prevention
financial.challenge: Financial institutions face sophisticated fraud attacks including payment fraud, account takeover, and money laundering schemes that can result in millions in losses.
financial.solution: Our 6 AI agents provide real-time detection of payment fraud, account takeover attempts, and suspicious money movement patterns with sub-second response times.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Fraud Prevention
ecommerce.challenge: Online retailers struggle with transaction fraud, promo abuse, account takeover, and high chargeback rates that erode margins and customer trust.
ecommerce.solution: Multi-agent fraud detection identifies fraudulent orders, promotional abuse, and account compromise before transactions complete.

insurance.title: Insurance Claims Fraud Detection
insurance.challenge: Insurance companies lose billions annually to fraudulent claims, staged accidents, application fraud, and premium fraud schemes.
insurance.solution: AI agents analyze claims patterns, detect staged events, verify applicant information, and identify premium fraud rings.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Fraud Prevention
healthcare.challenge: Healthcare organizations face medical billing fraud, identity theft, prescription fraud, and provider fraud that impact both finances and patient care.
healthcare.solution: Specialized agents detect billing anomalies, verify patient identity, flag suspicious prescriptions, and identify provider fraud patterns.
